ReliabilityGuide_VerifiedOrganizationSta.message: The existence of this organization and the certificates it holds have been verified by the OP Registry operator. You can view the organization's basic information and certificates to help assess the organization's reliability.

Unsupported_NonconformingDescription.message: Reliability information or distribution channel is not described according to specifications

Unsupported_MissingReliability.message: Organization reliability information is not included

Unsupported_MissingDistributionChannel.message: Publication distribution channel is not included

Unsupported_NoReliabilityInformationYet.message: Organization reliability information and publication distribution channel are not available yet

Unsupported_ReliabilityInformationRetrie.message: Failed to retrieve organization reliability information and publication distribution channel

Unsupported_ReliabilityInformationReadEr.message: Organization reliability information and publication distribution channel could not be read correctly

Unsupported_ReliabilityInformationContac.message: If you want to know about the organization's reliability information and publication distribution channel on this page, please contact the site administrator listed on the site

Unsupported_ReliabilityResolvesFollowing.message: Having organization reliability information and publication distribution channel can solve the following issues

Unsupported_ChallengeReliableInformation.message: Is there a way to see only reliable information in online articles and advertisements that actually convey facts...?

Unsupported_ChallengeFakeNews.message: Can't fake news and harmful sites be eliminated somehow...?

Unsupported_ChallengeReliabilityProblemA.message: Against the backdrop of the attention economy (valuing attention-grabbing), a structure has been created where articles that stand out, even if they are fake news, are more profitable than articles that convey facts. One major cause of this is the lack of a general means to verify the reliability of content publishers. By enabling viewers and ad delivery systems to identify quality articles and media, internet information distribution can be made healthier.

Unsupported_ChallengeAdAndMedia.message: Challenges for advertising and media professionals

Unsupported_ChallengeSketchySite.message: What?! Our ad is on such a dangerous site!!

Unsupported_ChallengeAdClashWithArticle.message: Wait, doesn't our ad clash with the content of this article?!

Unsupported_ChallengeAdRiskAndSolutionSt.message: Ads may be placed on inappropriate sites (media), or conversely, unwanted ads may be displayed. Fake sites may appear in search results, and fake news may be prominently spread on social media. By identifying appropriate sites and advertisers, matching appropriate sites and ads, and keeping records of their distribution, brand damage can be prevented.

Unsupported_ChallengeInformationRegulati.message: But regulating information isn't good, freedom of speech must also be protected

Unsupported_OPDisclaimer_HTML.message: That's right. However, Originator Profile technology does not discriminate between media and advertisers. We are considering utilizing existing certification bodies.

Unsupported_ChallengeIfThereWereInformat.message: If there were organization reliability information and publication distribution channel...

Unsupported_ChallengeReliabilityBenefits.message: It would become visible who created and published this page or content, making it possible to identify false and malicious sites, enabling safe and secure internet use.

Prohibition_DetailStatement.message: Originator Profile verifies whether this site is genuine using electronic certification called 'authentication key'. If this message is displayed, two causes are possible

Prohibition_DetailReason_1.message: A legitimate organization representative has made some error in handling the authentication key without malicious intent

Prohibition_DetailReason_2.message: A malicious third party has tampered with the authentication key to make a fake site appear genuine

Prohibition_DetailAdditional.message: Especially in case 2, it is considered a dangerous site that may deceive you and cause harm. For these reasons, we are informing you of the possibility that this site may be fake. Please note that the certificate may have been tampered with or forged.

Prohibition_DetailProceed.message: Understand the above and view the organization information and publication content

Prohibition_Site.message: The source of this site cannot be confirmed

Prohibition_Statement_HTML.message:
Many cases have occurred where people have fallen victim to logging in, registering personal information, or making payments on fake sites that look exactly like the real ones.
On this page, we could not confirm the site operator's information. Therefore, please be very careful about whether this site is genuine.

Prohibition_StatementDetail.message: Learn more about why this message is displayed...

ProjectSummary_Statement_1.message: Originator Profile technology is a technology that makes it easy to distinguish high-quality articles and media that have been verified by third parties by attaching verifiable information about web content creators and advertisers.

ProjectSummary_Statement_2.message: By increasing the transparency of content creators and distribution channels, and making it possible to identify reliable publishers, it helps increase and enhance the value of responsible, high-quality articles and media.

ProjectTitle_TechSummary.message: Technology to easily distinguish high-quality articles and media
